text:
Works correctly when compiled with "javac -encoding big5"  For JSP pages, the
character encoding defaults to that specified in the <%@ page %> directive,
while the javac compiler defaults to the platform default.  Therefore, you
cannot just cut and paste an internationalized string from a JSP page to a
servlet (or vice versa), unless you are using Unicode escapes which are
independent of the input character encoding.
